arm_group.description: effect of weight loss by applying sequential balloons

brief_summary.textblock:
The effect of the balloon on weight loss is investigated by multiple studies. However, the
      effect of the sequential balloons is not studied yet.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Weight Loss Effect of the Sequential Balloons

detailed_description.textblock:
We are aiming to study the effect of the sequential balloons in the patients who had weight
      loss with the first balloon and they need subsequent balloons to have more weight loss after
      their first balloons are removed after 6 months.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  BMI > 45 and weight >120 Kg

          -  Patients refused to have bariatric surgery.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Esophageal or gastric or duodenal lesions.

          -  Bleeding disorders.

          -  uncooperative patients.

intervention.description: sequential balloons  . Heliosphere bag (air filled balloon)

clinical_study.official_title: Study of Weight Loss Effect of the Sequential Balloons

primary_outcome.description: study the weight loss in form of KG and BMI before balloon, 6 months after and 12 months after

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
